name: cordova-plugin-datepicker
description: This is a combined version of DatePicker iOS and Android plugin for Cordova/Phonegap 3.0. - Original iOS and android version: https://github.com/VitaliiBlagodir/cordova-plugin-datepicker - Original WP8 version: https://github.com/hypermurea/phonegap-wp8-datepicker-plugin
